content:
Dear all,

I got two errors while opening Isabelle that lead not to execute codes. The error screen shows:

Build started for Isabelle/HOL ...

Ignoring bad database "/home/k/k_aksoy/.isabelle/Isabelle2021-1/heaps/polyml-2.9_x64-linux/log/Pure.db

Building Pure ...
*** Naproche-SAD server failure
*** Naproche-SAD: failed to create OS thread: Resource temporarily unavailable
Return code: 2 (FAILURE)

Session build failed -- prover process remains inactive!

What can I do for solving this issue?

Thank you for your help!

Regards,
Kubra
